user.title: Torn City Integration Setup
user.description:
Enter your Torn City API credentials. A **Full** access API key is recommended for complete functionality.

[Create a Full Access API key for Home Assistant](https://www.torn.com/preferences.php#tab=api?step=addNewKey&title=Home%20Assistant&user=*&property=*&faction=*&company=*&market=*&torn=*&key=*) or [manage existing keys](https://www.torn.com/preferences.php#tab=api)

data_description.api_key: Your Torn City API key. Full access recommended for battle stats.
data_description.update_interval: How often to fetch data from Torn API (30-3600 seconds)
